Articles.Content:
hi im trying to install this mod can anyone tell me if im doing it right ?

1 i put the sub assembly manager game data folder in the main ksp gamedata folder.

2 i put the plugin data file from the sub assembly manager folder into the plugin data folder in the ksp directory

im sure i aint doing it right because its not working lol but i havnt a clue

The paths should be like this:

KSP\GameData\SubassemblyManager\SubassemblyManager.dll

KSP\PluginData\subassemblyLoader\subasseblies\Landers

Lifters

Probes

Hope that helps.
yeah thx khaos tht seems to be working now
